jokes: Did you hear about the crook who stole a calendar? He got twelve months.
Did you hear about the semi-colon that broke the law? He was given two consecutive sentences.
A pig stands in front of an electric socket: “Oh no, who put you into that wall?!”
A lot of people cry when they cut onions. The trick is not to form an emotional bond.
My cat just walked up to the paper shredder and said, “Teach me  everything you know.”
There’s no “I” in denial.
-Peter Serafinowicz
What are they planting to grow the seedless watermelon?
- Jerry Seinfeld
You know it’s time to do the laundry when you dry off with a sneaker.
- Zach Galifianakis
Every novel is a mystery novel if you never finish it.
What did the egg say to the comedian
You always crack me up :-)
What do computers like to snack on?
Micro chips :-)
How does a train eat?
It chew-chew
Two muffics are in the oven. One says, "Gosh, it's hot in here"
The other replies, "Oh my gosh, it's a talking muffin!"
Did you hear about the new anti-gravity book?
Apparently you can't put it down. :-)
I am normally shy, but after a cup of coffee I find I can express-o my feelings. :-D
Why can't elephant use computers?
Because they're scared of the mouse. :-)
riddles: Where are average things manufactured?
The satisfactory.
You find me in December, but not in any other month. What am I?
The letter D!
I weigh nothing, but you can still see me. If you put me in a bucket, I make the bucket lighter. What am I?
A hole!
What rock group consists of four famous men, but none of them sing?
The faces on Mount Rushmore!
What five-letter word becomes shorter if you add two letters to it?
“Short” (add +”er”)!
I’m the size of an elephant, but I weigh nothing. What am I?
An elephant’s shadow!
Why is an island like the letter T?
They’re both in the middle of water!
How many seconds are there in a year?
Twelve—January 2nd, February 2nd, March 2nd…
How do you make the number one disappear?
Add the letter G and then presto—it’s Gone!
There are three apples on a table and you take away two of them. How many apples do you have now?
Two, of course!
How many cats can you put in an empty box?
One. After that, the box isn’t empty anymore.
What starts with “e,” ends with “e,” and contains one letter?
An envelope.
A man rode in to town on Tuesday, and left two days later on Tuesday. How so?
His horse is named Tuesday!
What did zero say to eight?
Nice belt.
I am the beginning of the end, and the end of time and space. I am essential to creation, and I surround every place. Who am I?
The letter E.
What's a computer's least favourite food?
Spam
